title: Painting Landscape and Water in Oils
brief_description: A step-by-step guide showing the materials and techniques used by internationally famous artist, W.R. (Robin) Jennings. Although an artist of rare skill, Jennings is largely self-taught and his own thoughts on technique are enjoyable to follow. Notes which accompany this video cover helpful information on the equipment needed.
